explains: adv. 不可否认地；确凿无疑地

sentences.en: It was undeniably a revolt by ordinary people against their leaders.
sentences.cn: 不可否认，这是一场普通百姓反抗领导人的起义。

sentences.en: There was undeniably a strong theoretical dimension to his thinking.
sentences.cn: 不可否认，他的想法很有理论深度。

sentences.en: Bringing up a baby is undeniably hard work.
sentences.cn: 抚养一个孩子无可否认地是项艰苦的工作。
